entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
